Class PhD

  • java.lang.Object
    • PhD

  • public class PhD
extends java.lang.Object
    An instance maintains info about the PhD of a person.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PhD(java.lang.String n, char g, int y, int m)
      Constructor: an instance for a person with name n, gender g, PhD year y, and PhD month m.
      PhD(java.lang.String n, char g, int y, int m, PhD ad)
      Constructor: a PhD with name n, gender g, PhD year y, PhD month m, first advisor ad, and no second advisor.
      PhD(java.lang.String n, char g, int y, int m, PhD ad1, PhD ad2)
      Constructor: a PhD with name n, gender g, PhD year y, PhD month m, first advisor ad1, and second advisor ad2.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAdvisor1(PhD p)
      Add p as this person's first PhD advisor.
      void addAdvisor2(PhD p)
      Add p as this persons second advisor.
      PhD getAdvisor1()
      Return this Phd's first advisor (null if unknown)
      PhD getAdvisor2()
      Return this PhD's second advisor (null if unknown or nonexistent).
      int getMonth()
      Return the month this person got their PhD.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Return this person's name.
      int getYear()
      Return the year this person got their PhD.
      boolean isFemale()
      Return the value of "this person is a female".
      boolean isOlderThan(PhD p)
      Return value of "this person got their PhD before p did." Precondition: p is not null.
      boolean isPhDSibling(PhD p)
      Return value of "this person and p are intellectual siblings.” Precondition: p is not null.
      int numAdvisees()
      Return the number of PhD advisees of this person.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PhD

        public PhD(java.lang.String n,
   char g,
   int y,
   int m)
        Constructor: an instance for a person with name n, gender g, PhD year y, and PhD month m. Its advisors are unknown, and it has no advisees. Precondition: n has at least 1 character, m is in 1..12, and g is 'M' for male or 'F' for female.

      • PhD

        public PhD(java.lang.String n,
   char g,
   int y,
   int m,
   PhD ad)
        Constructor: a PhD with name n, gender g, PhD year y, PhD month m, first advisor ad, and no second advisor. Precondition: n has at least 1 char, g is 'F' for female or 'M' for male, m is in 1..12, and ad is not null.

      • PhD

        public PhD(java.lang.String n,
   char g,
   int y,
   int m,
   PhD ad1,
   PhD ad2)
        Constructor: a PhD with name n, gender g, PhD year y, PhD month m, first advisor ad1, and second advisor ad2. Precondition: n has at least 1 char, g is 'F' for female or 'M' for male, m is in 1..12, ad1 and ad2 are not null, and ad1 and ad2 are different.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Return this person's name.

      • getYear

        public int getYear()
        Return the year this person got their PhD.

      • getMonth

        public int getMonth()
        Return the month this person got their PhD.

      • isFemale

        public boolean isFemale()
        Return the value of "this person is a female".

      • getAdvisor1

        public PhD getAdvisor1()
        Return this Phd's first advisor (null if unknown)

      • getAdvisor2

        public PhD getAdvisor2()
        Return this PhD's second advisor (null if unknown or nonexistent).

      • numAdvisees

        public int numAdvisees()
        Return the number of PhD advisees of this person.

      • addAdvisor1

        public void addAdvisor1(PhD p)
        Add p as this person's first PhD advisor. Precondition: this person's first advisor is unknown and p is not null.

      • addAdvisor2

        public void addAdvisor2(PhD p)
        Add p as this persons second advisor. Precondition: This person's first advisor is known, their second advisor is unknown, p is not null, and p is different from this person's first advisor.

      • isOlderThan

        public boolean isOlderThan(PhD p)
        Return value of "this person got their PhD before p did." Precondition: p is not null.

      • isPhDSibling

        public boolean isPhDSibling(PhD p)
        Return value of "this person and p are intellectual siblings.” Precondition: p is not null.
